projects.name: ART 2 HIRE - A Job Platform
projects.description: The app allows job seekers to create profiles, upload resumes, search for jobs, and submit applications, while employers can post jobs, manage applications, and track job performance. Built with NestJS, TypeORM, PostgreSQL, and Passport for robust authentication and data management, ensuring a secure and seamless user experience.

projects.name: Shopping Cart
projects.description: The platform offers detailed product listings, advanced search and filtering, and a user-friendly shopping cart, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable shopping experience. Built with React.js for the frontend and Node.js with Express.js for the backend.

projects.name: Shikshak-Shaakha
projects.description: The platform facilitates seamless interaction between students and teachers, promoting a collaborative educational environment.Built with Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.

experiences.description: Develop and maintain robust microservices using NestJS, handling all aspects from API design to deployment, resulting in a scalable and seamless system that enhances user experience. Work with cross-functional teams to design and deploy innovative backend solutions, improving system efficiency and user satisfaction.

Designed and developed responsive web pages using ReactJS, ensuring seamless functionality across various screen sizes and devices. Gained hands-on experience in React, Material-UI by implement user-friendly interfaces, enhancing overall user experience and engagement.
Designed and developed a responsive website themed around donations, utilizing HTML, CSS, Javascript and Bootstrap.
